title: Sadiq Khan calls Tories morally rotten and says PM’s silence on Lee Anderson makes Muslims fair game

description: Steve Bannon, who was Trump’s chief strategist in the White House, thinks Keir Starmer's Labour will crush the Tories - but Nigel Farage's Reform party will turn into 'a populist party, just like MAGA' and take over the Conservative

title: BBC should be proud to be progressive, director general told staff
description: Richard Tice, the leader of Reform UK, said: “Tim Davie’s comments confirm how deeply embedded Left-wing ideology is at the BBC. These comments prove the BBC is not fit for purpose and should be immediately defunded.” Robin Aitken, a former senior ...

title: Suburban women in their sixties could decide the next election
description: The analysis, titled Behind the Voting Intention, also found those who have abandoned the Tories in favour of Reform UK are highly unlikely to return to Rishi Sunak’s party. Twenty-three per cent of those surveyed voted Labour and plan to do so again ...

title: Farage woos Anderson after Tory suspended over Khan comments
description: Lee Anderson has had the Conservative whip withdrawn after claiming that “Islamists” have “got control” of Sadiq Khan. On Saturday afternoon, a spokesman for the Chief Whip Simon Hart said: “Following his refusal to apologise for comments made yesterday, the Chief Whip has suspended the Conservative whip from Lee Anderson MP.”

title: Reform leader Tice wants to legistlate supposed Sharia Law threats
description: Reform UK leader Richard Tice said the country is at the “Everest base camp of sectarian politics” as he said political leaders, the establishment and the police were all in fear of extremists.

title: Rural Right-wing voters abandon Tories in huge switch to Reform UK
description: Former Conservative voters living in the countryside are shifting allegiance to Richard Tice’s party, suggests poll by Labour think tank

title: UK forced to pull out of major energy deal after European Union infighting
description: The UK government says it is withdrawing from the controversial Energy Charter Treaty after efforts to modernise it ended in stalemate.

title: I thought Reform UK’s rally would be a circus. It was more of a wake
description: It’s the first sunny Saturday of the year at Doncaster racecourse as Richard Tice takes to the stage at Reform UK’s spring conference. The party leader is framed by two vast portraits of his own face, smiling beatifically against a Union flag backdrop.

title: Nigel Farage says Lee Anderson is welcome to join Reform UK after he's suspended by Tories

title: I thought Reform’s rally would be a circus. It was more of a wake
description: With a new slogan ‘Ready to SAVE Britain’, the party is luring disillusioned voters on both sides of the political fence. So what actually is their manifesto?

description: The former Countdown and BBC radio presenter hit out at Anderson as '30p Lee' - after his comments suggesting people in poverty should be able to make meals costing that much - on Saturday.

title: Reform UK: Existential threat to the Tories or here today, gone tomorrow?
description: Emboldened by two byelections successes, Reform UK seeks to capitalise on voter disenchantment with the ruling party. But how much of a threat are they to the Tories?

title: Reform UK piles fresh pressure on Rishi Sunak with radical promises on tax and immigration
description: Labour and Tory governments have broken promise after promise... they have destroyed trust in our democracy and let down the British people.’

title: Nigel Farage calls on 'cancelled' Lee Anderson to join Reform and destroy the Tories

title: Reform leader Tice says plans for fundamental NHS reforms are not privatisation

title: Reform Party would raise 40p income tax threshold to £70,000 says leader Richard Tice as he unveils 'tax slashing' draft election manifesto
description: The draft election manifesto was unveiled today, with Mr Tice stating that he promises to reverse Rishi Sunak's stealth tax.
